name: Inability to access required service as it is not enabled
details: For example, Developer Mode may not be enabled on an Android device, or iOS services stopped due to USB Restricted Mode
references: Belkasoft (undated) Dealing with Apple's USB Restricted Mode, https://belkasoft.com/dealing_with_usb_restricted_mode
